nl: If $G$ is an abelian group and if $G$ has an element of order $m$ and one of order $n$, where $m$ and $n$ are relatively prime, prove that $G$ has an element of order $mn$.
lean:
∀ {G : Type*} [CommGroup G] {m n : ℕ}
  (hm : ∃ (g : G), orderOf g = m)
  (hn : ∃ (g : G), orderOf g = n)
  (hmn : m.Coprime n) :
  ∃ (g, G), orderOf g = m * n
candidate: ∀ {G : Type _} [Group G] {m n : ℕ} (hm : ∀ g : G, g ^ m = 1) (hn : ∀ g : G, g ^ n = 1) (hmn : m ∣ n ∨ n ∣ m) : ∃ g, G, g ^ m * g ^ n = 1
